content:
<rule id="apm-00002" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="{*}" groupId="{*}elastic.apm{*}"/>
                    </project>
                    <file filename="elastic-apm{*}.jar"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Application Performance Management (APM) tool - Elastic APM">
                    <description>The application uses Elastic APM.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Elastic APM</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
